snippet: Monday’s highlights from around the web include an app built only for two people to share messages and photos with each other. Plus, Jolla, founded by former Nokia engineers, is about to become Finland’s best known cellphone maker.
abstract: Monday’s highlights from around the web include an app built only for two people to share messages and photos with each other. Plus, Jolla, founded by former Nokia engineers, is about to become Finland’s best known cellphone maker.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: South Korea's Romance App and Finland's Other Cellphone Manufacturer
